name: Agentic Rust Development Environment
postCreateCommand: mkdir -p src/agents src/agui src/mcp src/api tests examples

cat > Cargo.toml << 'EOF'
[package]
name = "agentic-rust"
version = "0.1.0"
edition = "2021"
authors = ["Agentic Rust Developer"]
description = "Agentic Rust Development Environment"
readme = "README.md"

[dependencies]
# Async runtime
tokio = { version = "1.0", features = ["full"] }
async-trait = "0.1"
futures = "0.3"

# Web framework
axum = { version = "0.7", features = ["headers", "ws"] }
tower = "0.4"
tower-http = { version = "0.5", features = ["cors", "trace"] }
hyper = "1.0"

# HTTP client
reqwest = { version = "0.12", features = ["json", "stream"] }

# Serialization
serde = { version = "1.0", features = ["derive"] }
serde_json = "1.0"
toml = "0.8"

# Error handling
thiserror = "1.0"
anyhow = "1.0"

# Logging
tracing = "0.1"
tracing-subscriber = { version = "0.3", features = ["env-filter"] }
tracing-appender = "0.2"

# UUID and time
uuid = { version = "1.0", features = ["v4", "serde"] }
chrono = { version = "0.4", features = ["serde"] }

# AI/ML libraries
candle-core = "0.4"
candle-nn = "0.4"
candle-transformers = "0.4"

# Environment variables
dotenv = "0.15"

# Testing
mockall = "0.12"

[dev-dependencies]
tokio-test = "0.4"
axum-test = "14.0"
wiremock = "0.6"

[profile.dev]
opt-level = 0
debug = true

[profile.release]
opt-level = 3
lto = true
codegen-units = 1
panic = "abort"

[[bin]]
name = "agent-server"
path = "src/bin/agent-server.rs"

[[bin]]
name = "mcp-client"
path = "src/bin/mcp-client.rs"
EOF

cat > src/error.rs << 'EOF'
use thiserror::Error;

#[derive(Error, Debug)]
pub enum AgentError {
    #[error("HTTP client error: {0}")]
    Http(#[from] reqwest::Error),
    
    #[error("Serialization error: {0}")]
    Serialization(#[from] serde_json::Error),
    
    #[error("IO error: {0}")]
    Io(#[from] std::io::Error),
    
    #[error("Agent error: {0}")]
    Agent(String),
    
    #[error("MCP error: {0}")]
    Mcp(String),
    
    #[error("Configuration error: {0}")]
    Config(String),
}

pub type Result<T> = std::result::Result<T, AgentError>;
EOF
mkdir -p src/agents src/agui src/mcp src/api src/bin
